QuestData.Title: Carp Diem
QuestData.Description: Despite the hozen's apparent disarray, there is an order to their chaos. Their leader, Chief Gukgut, is the shrewd mastermind behind their attacks.$B$BHe is organizing their movements at the great pit at the hozen camp to the northwest.$B$BStrike now and show him no mercy, $n, for he will do the same.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: The leader of the Slingtail hozen.
QuestData.RewardText: Without their leader, these hozen should once again settle into disarray.$B$BToday we rejoice in our victory! $n, you came to us a stranger, but you depart as a friend.$B$BFrom henceforth, you are the highest of the high - a valued friend and defender of the Pearlfin tribe.
